attributes.action: UK Government reject the outcome of the advisory EU Referendum
attributes.additional_details:
The EU Referendum of 23rd June 2016 was very narrowly won by a vote of 51.9% leave versus 48.1% remain.

Already the lies, deception and extreme miscalculations from the leave campaign have started coming to the surface. The decision to leave cannot be allowed to continue.
attributes.background:
The UK government have the power to reject the advisory vote cast by the British public, and can remain within the EU.

This petition emplores the uk government to cast their own vote in parliament to reject the outcome of the EU referendum and save Britian from economic oblivion.
